title: Ep. 130 - Even Odds by Elia Winters (PART 1)
itunes:title: Ep. 130 - Even Odds by Elia Winters (PART 1)
description:
Hey HBs! We're here with part 1 of Even Odds by Elia Winters! It's a sweet contemporary romance about two game designers who may also bring some gameplay into the bedroom... and the office! 
 CW: discussions of sexual harassment in the workplace
 Bonus Content: the baby ate Melody's headphones, a Tim Gunn start to a romance, *Bing Boong Bong* Travel Sized Sex Toys, is Erin the Caleb of Heaving Bosoms?, the secret to getting a person to love you: see snow for the first time!, unpacking vs NOT in hotel rooms, the dirtiest hotel room Erin has ever encountered, and so much more! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Melody: Mutual masturbation! In these strange, dark times, you can still get your sexy on while skipping the swapping of body fluids! Just post up around 6 ft. away from your partner and engage in some play that way.
 Erin: Self Care the App Game! It lets you pretend like you're spending all day in bed while engaging in self-care activities like breathing exercises and more! 
 Episode Sponsor: 
  THE SINNER by JR Ward! It's #18 in her Black Dagger Brotherhood Series.
 Patreon Shout Out: 
 Amanda P, You are a Jorogumo, a beautiful Japanese ghost woman who can shapeshift into lots of fire-breathing spiders or one big ladyspider, depending on your preference. You live near a beautiful waterfall, and have been known to catch unsuspecting woodsmen in your webs and drag them back to your spider lair. Rumor has it that you consume the men you trap in your webs, but we like to think you're just having a great time in a reverse harem lumberjack situation under a waterfall. No one has seen one of you in about 400 years, probably because you are having such a good time. Cheers!
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)

CW: discussions of sexual harassment in the workplace

Bonus Content: the baby ate Melody's headphones, a Tim Gunn start to a romance, *Bing Boong Bong* Travel Sized Sex Toys, is Erin the Caleb of Heaving Bosoms?, the secret to getting a person to love you: see snow for the first time!, unpacking vs NOT in hotel rooms, the dirtiest hotel room Erin has ever encountered, and so much more!
